form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Ernst (for herself, Mr. Crapo, Mr. Cramer, Mr. Justice, Mr. Grassley, Mr. Cruz, Mr. Graham, Mr. Risch, Mr. Marshall, Mr. Lee, Mr. Ricketts, Mr. Lankford, Mr. Hawley, Mr. Scott of South Carolina, and Mrs. Hyde-Smith) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To include sexual assault and aggravated sexual violence in the definition of aggravated felony under the Immigration and Nationality Act in order to expedite the removal of aliens convicted of any such crime.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Better Enforcement of Grievous Offenses by unNaturalized Emigrants or the BE GONE Act.

section.header: Expanding the definition of aggravated felonies under the Immigration and Nationality Act
